gobblin.publisher

Class SingleTaskDataPublisher

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.publisher.DataPublisher
      • gobblin.publisher.SingleTaskDataPublisher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public abstract class SingleTaskDataPublisher
extends DataPublisher
    A subclass of DataPublisher that can publish data of a single Task.

      • Fields inherited from class gobblin.publisher.DataPublisher

    • Constructor Detail

      • SingleTaskDataPublisher

        public SingleTaskDataPublisher(State state)

    • Method Detail

      • publishData

        public abstract void publishData(WorkUnitState state)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Publish the data for the given task. The state must contains property "writer.final.output.file.paths" (or "writer.final.output.file.paths.[branchId]" if there are multiple branches), so that the publisher knows which files to publish.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • publishMetadata

        public abstract void publishMetadata(WorkUnitState state)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Publish the metadata (e.g., schema) for the given task. Checkpoints should not be published as part of metadata. They are published by Gobblin runtime after the metadata and data are published.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • publish

        public void publish(WorkUnitState state)
             throws java.io.IOException
        First publish the metadata via DataPublisher#publishMetadata(WorkUnitState), and then publish the output data via the DataPublisher#publishData(WorkUnitState) method.
        Parameters:
        state - is a WorkUnitState.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem with publishing the metadata or the data.
